author: Paul
content: A great post, Andreas. I think that I fall in line with you, save for the daily posting. ðŸ™‚ I remember the beginning when I had zero visitors, then one, then two, and away it went. It's been fun and I tried advertising for a bit, didn't earn much of anything, then took it away. Like it is for you, it's just plain old fun! Keep posting. I'll keep reading!
